## R Markdown

This is an R Markdown presentation. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. Click the **Help** toolbar button for more details on using R Markdown.

When you click the **Knit** button a document will be generated that includes both content as well as the output of any embedded R code chunks within the document.
